description: A convolution triangle of numbers obtained from A034687.
comments: a(n,1) = A034687(n). a(n,m)=: s2(6; n,m), a member of a sequence of unsigned triangles including s2(2; n,m)= A007318(n-1,m-1) (Pascal's triangle). s2(3; n,m)= A035324(n,m), s2(4; n,m)= A035529(n,m), s2(5; n,m)= A048882(n,m).
links: W. Lang, On generalizations of Stirling number triangles, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 3 (2000), #00.2.4.
mathematica: a[n_, m_] := Coefficient[Series[((-1 + (1 - 25*x)^(-1/5))/5)^m, {x, 0, n}], x^n];Flatten[Table[a[n, m], {n, 1, 9}, {m, 1, n}]][[1 ;; 38]](* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jun 21 2011, after g.f. *)
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
